thread.title: Beyonce flashes the middle finger with mum Tina Knowles
thread.title_full: Beyonce flashes the middle finger with mum Tina Knowles | Daily Mail Online

author: Jessica Rach For Mailonline
title: Beyonce flashes the middle finger with mum Tina Knowles
text:
She gave a show-stopping performance before picking up two Grammy Awards last week, despite missing out on the coveted Best Album prize.
And Beyonce let her hair down following the glitzy ceremony, showing off her sassier side as she posed alongside her mother Tina Knowles, giving the camera their middle finger.
The pregnant superstar, 35, looked sensational as she celebrated the afterparty in a plunging white dress.
Scroll down for video
'I ain't thinkin bout you': Beyonce let her hair down following the Grammys, showing off her sassier side as she posed with mum Tina Knowles, giving the camera their middle finger
Showing off her enviable curves, the number featured a gold belt across her blooming baby bump, cape sleeves and was slashed high on the thigh.
She matched it with a top hat, pulled low on her stunning face as she threw her diamond-encrusted fingers up at the camera.
Proving good genes run in the family, mum Tina Knowles, 63, looked beautiful in a low-cut black dress as she too gestured at the camera.
Sizzling: The pregnant superstar, 35, looked sensational as she celebrated the afterparty in a plunging white dress last Sunday
Lady in red: Nine-times nominated Beyonce slipped into a red sequinned dress to attend the Grammys with Jay Z on Sunday night
The middle finger gesture echoes the words from Beyonce's famous Sorry song, featuring the bridge lyrics: 'Middle fingers up, put them hands high; Wave it in his face, tell him, boy, bye; Tell him, boy, bye, boy, bye, middle fingers up; I ain't thinking 'bout you.'
The behind-the snaps garnered a mixed Twitter response, with some praising the songstress as 'cool', while others questioned the singer's move.
'Beyonce is a classy lady WHO made her do this pregnant middle finger pic', one fan wrote.
Yay or nay? The behind-the snaps garnered a mixed Twitter response, with some praising the songstress as 'cool', while others questioned the singer's move
But another stood behind the star,with one follower writing: 'Only Beyonce could make middle finger pics look cool'.
Meanwhile the songstress gave a jaw-dropping nine minute performance in an array of gold ensembles during the Grammy Awards last Sunday.
Supported by mum Tina, husband Jay Z and sister Solange, who bagged Best R&B performance for hit Cranes in The Sky, the night was one for the A List.
Talent: Beyonce went into the evening with nine nominations, and took home the gong for best Best Urban Contemporary Album for Lemonade and Best Music Video for Formation
Winner: The star gave a show-stopping performance during the ceremony in two gold ensembles, marking her first performance since announcing her pregnancy
The talented songstress was nominated for an impressive nine awards, before bagging the gong for best Best Urban Contemporary Album for Lemonade and Best Music Video for Formation.
In a touching display Adele was seen breaking her Grammy in half, after the British songstress won the coveted Album of the year.
Giving Beyonce half of the Award, she added: 'I can't possibly accept this award,' she said during her acceptance speech.
Suits you! Blue Ivy, 5, paid tribute to Prince with frilly shirt and jacket while sitting on Jay Z's lap at the Grammys ahead of pregnant mom Beyonce's performance
'The Lemonade album was just so monumental, Beyoncé. It was so monumental and well thought-out and beautiful and soul-baring... we appreciate that. All of us artists here adore you. You are our light.'
She later added backstage: 'I thought it was her year. What the f**k does she have to do to win Album of the Year?'
And Beyonce took the news graciously, partying with her family as well as reuniting with former Destiny's Child bandmates Michelle Williams and Kelly Rowland at an intimate post-Grammy's bash,in her sizzling white dress as documented on her website.
Golden moment: The hitmaker- who is pregnant with twins, showcased her belly in a sequin gown and yellow cape
After party: The Crazy In Love singer partied with Kelly Rowland (left) and sister Solange (right) following the bash
Beyonce's performance marked her first public appearance since announcing she was pregnant with twins, and the mother to five-year-old daughter Blue Ivy debuted her baby bump at the show in both a gold bikini and a gold sequin gown.
The hitmaker announced the news on Instagram two weeks ago in what became the most liked image, garnering a staggering 10.5million likes.
Posing in her underwear as she cradled her bump, Beyonce wrote alongside the snap: 'We would like to share our love and happiness. We have been blessed two times over.
Her inner circle: Solange and her husband Alan Ferguson (center) were also at the bash
Pop royalty! Beyonce got together with her Destiny's Child bandmates Kelly Rowland (center) and Michelle Williams (right) over the weekend for the post-Grammys bash
We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. - The Carters'.
Meanwhile, folllowing the Grammys, DJ Khaled dropped new single, titled Shining, on Jay's Tidal, with both the rapper and Beyonce making a cameo appearance.
And Jay Z's line of verse even reference his unborn twins: 'Don't let me have a son, I'm a fool/I want a boy and a girl to fight for truth, but whatever God give me, I'm cool.' GRAMMY AWARDS 2017 WINNERS Song of the Year
